MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G62 postcode area of Bardowie and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:30pm due to an underground cable fault in the Boclair View area and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:13pm on Sunday, 01 November 2020
